rukus.text: Those emigrated DI ili persekut ni surely far gxi them generously en this life recompense Hereafter est eben greater ili nur kon
This est because ili steadfastly persevere en their Lord ili fid
Ni ne send vi hom ni inspir. Pet those kon scripture vi ne kon
Ni proviz them proofs scriptures. Ni send down vi this message proklam popol cxio send down them perhaps ili reflect
those scheme evil schemes garanti ke DI testament ne kauxz ter Did al glut them ke retribution ne ven them when ili malpli expect gxi
Gxi strik them while ili est asleep ili neniam escape
Gxi strik them while ili fearfully expecting gxi! Your Lord est Compassionate Merciful
Ili ne seg all ajx hav kre DI? Their ombr surround them tre las en total submission al DI kaj volont
Al DI prostrates cxio heavens cxio sur ter! - Cxiu creature - Kaj tial do angxel; malplej arrogance
Ili reverence their Lord alt super them ili do ki ili komand do
